pr_title: HDDS-2552. Sonar: Save and reuse Random object in GenesisUtil

timeline.message: HDDS-2552. Sonar: Save and reuse Random object in GenesisUti

timeline.bodyText: Given that this is also used for non-client SCM and OM addresses, wouldn't something like RANDOM_LOCAL_ADDRESS be a better name?
timeline.author: adoroszlai
